summary: Gives the Orc race a constant effect called Wild Blood gives all Orcs an edge in combat and how much damage they can take.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#000000][size=6]                             
                                 [i]Orcs are Strong! [/i]

  [/size][size=6]                  
                                 [img]http://i.imgur.com/VFlvwAI.png[/img][/size][/color][color=#000000][size=6]


[/size][/color][font=Trebuchet MS][size=4][color=#000000]            [/color][color=#cccccc] [/color][/size][/font][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#000000][size=4]                                            [/size][size=5]"[i]You puny weakling!![/i]"[/size][/color][size=4][color=#000000]
                               This time when you hear an Orc say that, he really means it.
[/color][/size][/font]                                       
                                           [size=4][color=#000000] If you are [/color][color=#5b0f00]Bloodkin[/color][color=#000000] and like this mod then please [/color][color=#bf9000]Endorse![/color][color=#000000] [/color][/size][font=Trebuchet MS][size=4][color=#000000]
[/color]
[/size][/font][font=Verdana][color=#000000][size=5]Description:[/size]

[size=4]In past Elder Scrolls games like Oblivion and Morrowind, when you encountered an Orc it was bad news, you knew you had a serious fight on your hands or better give a wide berth. In Skyrim I have taken out multiple Orc bandits with a tiny Bosmer in melee, posing no more of a challenge than anybody else for that matter.[/size]

[size=4]This is a simple and in my opinion lore friendly mod in the spirit of the lore description of the Orc race, and it adds a constant effect ability to [/size][u][size=4]ALL[/size][/u][size=4] Orcs in game including Vampires! [/size]

[size=4]NPC and Player alike will have this constant ability called "Wild Blood" making it more fun to play as an Orc tank and more challenging to take on Orcs in combat. This does not mean you can't die taking on multiple opponents playing as an Orc or can't win against a band of Orcs, just both are more rewarding now.[/size]

[size=4]The stats boil down to all Orcs dealing 15% more damage in combat including ranged, and taking 20% less damage. [/size]
[size=4]The combat feels to me more balanced playing as an Orc, not overpowering but definitely noticeable.[/size]

[/color][/font][font=Verdana][color=#000000][size=5]Credits:[/size][/color][/font]

[size=4][color=#000000]This mod was made in collaboration with [/color][color=#9900ff]RefurbMadness[/color][color=#000000] who enabled me to realize my idea, many thanks![/color]
[color=#000000]Thanks to Bethesda for this great game and the tool to Mod it![/color]
[/size]
[color=#000000][size=5]Installation:[/size][/color]

[size=4][color=#000000]Download with NMM and make sure it is checked in the load order. Manual installation, extract esp file from the zip folder and place in your Data folder. Load this mod after any other race or combat related mods, this affects the Orc race only and should work with other race and combat mods as it just adds a new ability.[/color]
[color=#000000]As always [/color][color=#000000][u]make a back up if you value your particular character![/u] As with any mod use at your own risk!
"Orcs are Strong" has been cleaned with TES5Edit.[/color]
[/size]
[color=#000000][size=5]Compatability:[/size]

[size=4]I have tested this with Character Creation Overhaul by Syclonix and they work well together. I highly recommend that mod for a more customized game play, click [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21587/?]here[/url][size=4] to check it out.[/size][/color]
author: Kursan
